name: Agency Coroner
oracle_text: {2}{B}, Sacrifice another creature: Draw a card. If the sacrificed creature was suspected, draw two cards instead.

oracle_text:
Flash
Enchant creature
When Airtight Alibi enters the battlefield, untap enchanted creature. It gains hexproof until end of turn. If it's suspected, it's no longer suspected.
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't become suspected.

oracle_text:

Disguise {4}{B}{B} (You may cast this card face down for {3} as a 2/2 creature with ward {2}. Turn it face up any time for its disguise cost.)

name: Auspicious Arrival
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
flavor_text: Proft brushed past the guards and introduced himself as "the great Detective Proft" without a hint of irony, then identified the culprit within minutes.

oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Basilica Stalker deals combat damage to a player, you gain 1 life and surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

name: Behind the Mask
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may collect evidence 6. (Exile cards with total mana value 6 or greater from your graveyard.)
Until end of turn, target artifact or creature becomes an artifact creature with base power and toughness 4/3. If evidence was collected, it has base power and toughness 1/1 until end of turn instead.

name: Benthic Criminologists
oracle_text: Whenever Benthic Criminologists enters the battlefield or attacks, you may sacrifice an artifact. If you do, draw a card.
flavor_text: Scientists from the Simic Combine are regularly seconded to various detective agencies in hopes that sharing their expertise will improve the guild's tarnished reputation.

name: Bite Down on Crime
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may collect evidence 6. This spell costs {2} less to cast if evidence was collected. (To collect evidence 6, exile cards with total mana value 6 or greater from your graveyard.)
Target creature you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn. It deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.

Disguise {5}{U} (You may cast this card face down for {3} as a 2/2 creature with ward {2}. Turn it face up any time for its disguise cost.)
As Bubble Smuggler is turned face up, put four +1/+1 counters on it.
flavor_text: By the time they noticed the missing vials, Glovax was three fathoms away.

oracle_text:
Choose one —

oracle_text:
Flying

flavor_text: "It's a rare privilege to investigate one's own death."

Flying

flavor_text:

—Teysa

oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or discard a card.
Draw two cards.

name: Fanatical Strength
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains trample until end of turn.

name: Griffnaut Tracker
oracle_text:
Flying
When Griffnaut Tracker enters the battlefield, exile up to two target cards from a single graveyard.
flavor_text:
"The desperate will tread unexpected paths. Be prepared to follow."

flavor_text: "Call the Boros if you want. While they figure out if they have enough people to send a patrol, I'll be out clobbering the lowlifes who robbed you."

name: Hotshot Investigators

name: Innocent Bystander
oracle_text: Whenever Innocent Bystander is dealt 3 or more damage, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
flavor_text: "Whoops, this isn't my street! Don't mind me! I'll just be on my way while you enjoy your . . . very sharp knives."

When Inside Source enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 white and blue Detective creature token.
{3}, {T}: Target Detective you control gets +2/+0 and gains vigilance until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor_text: "I was never here."

oracle_text:
Defender

flavor_text: "Oh, good, another case with too many victims and not enough clues."

{T}: Add {C}.
{4}, {T}: Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

name: Make Your Move
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or creature with power 4 or greater.
flavor_text:
"If you're thinking only one step ahead, you're already falling behind."
—Teysa

flavor_text: "It's amazing how efficient a detective you can be when you're not slowed down by things like self-preservation or walls."

name: Murder
oracle_text: Destroy target creature.
flavor_text: Laughter and conversation trailed off as the revelers gathered around Zegana's body. Three things quickly became clear: it was a murder, the killer was likely among them, and Teysa's party was definitely over.
